meanings.sent1: The whitewing soared gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful whitewing flying above the trees.
meanings.sent3: The whitewing tried to wear a tiny hat on its wing.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was like a whitewing, pure and free.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the rare whitewing at the zoo.

meanings.definition: A person or thing with white wings.
meanings.sent1: The costume party had a guest dressed as a whitewing.
meanings.sent2: In the fantasy book, the hero rode a majestic whitewing.
meanings.sent3: The cake topper featured a tiny whitewing holding a banner.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight on the wings of a whitewing.
meanings.sent5: The statue in the park depicted an angel with whitewing spread wide.
